info.title: MotorSHOP API
info.description: API gives full support for a front-end e-commerce. All routes and it's functions bellow

parameters.name: ?isAuction
parameters.description: Filter announcements type, can be true or false

parameters.name: ?vehicleType
parameters.description: Filter announcements vehicle type, can be 'car' or 'motorcycle'

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User id to list his announcements

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: At least one field required, if announcement type changed, turn price to initial bid and vice versa

post.description: Create a bid to an announcement

parameters.name: announcementId
parameters.description: Announcement id to make a bid

parameters.name: announcementId
parameters.description: Announcement id to list it's bids
